short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and display all href links on the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily manage and interact with all the links on any webpage with our Link Extractor extension. 

This simple yet powerful tool automatically identifies every link on the page, displaying the first and last links prominently for quick access, followed by a complete list. You can copy individual links to your clipboard with a single click or export the entire list for further use. 

Perfect for security or web professionals who need to gather, review, or share multiple links efficiently.

Download the Link Extractor extension today!
